WorkItem.ClosedComment: I'm pretty sure that I've fixed this in the ASP-MVC3-RAZOR branch
WorkItem.Description:
Good idea....
Scott
-----

I've noticed that nerddinner is using a bit different version of DotNetOpenAuth in the MVC3 Razor version. To be more precise all of the HtmlHelper extension methods in DotNetOpenAuth.Mvc don't need the Page parameter which actually makes it possible to
 use them with Razor view engine.

Where could one get a hold of that version?

 

Thanks,

Goran
WorkItem.Summary: Update OpenID HtmlHelpers in MVC 3 Razor

Comments.Message:
Goran, I submitted a change last night with a working implementation using the latest version of DotNetOpenAuth. See http://nerddinner.codeplex.com/SourceControl/changeset/changes/63323

Pete
